comments.text:
Created attachment 572765
Screenshot of the issue

Steps to reproduce:
1.Have a directory in drafts
2.create a subdirectory in the directory, and make sure you have some mails inside it
3.Rename the folder Name1+Name2+Name3.

Expected results:
No notifications should appear

Actual results:
The Thunderbird notifications spam my desktop
